feature.name: switchyard-quickstart-camel-ftp-binding
feature.config: storefile = etc/ftpclient.jks hostsfile = etc/known_hosts_sftp keyfile = etc/id_sftp_rsa

feature.name: switchyard-quickstart-camel-jpa-binding
feature.config: aries.transaction.recoverable = true aries.transaction.timeout = 600 aries.transaction.howl.maxLogFiles = 2 aries.transaction.howl.maxBlocksPerFile = 512 aries.transaction.howl.bufferSizeKBytes = 4

feature.name: switchyard-demo-policy-transaction
feature.config: aries.transaction.recoverable = true aries.transaction.timeout = 600 aries.transaction.howl.maxLogFiles = 2 aries.transaction.howl.maxBlocksPerFile = 512 aries.transaction.howl.bufferSizeKBytes = 4
